publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1532 Brian Adam: Glencraft Aberdeen—That the Parliament notes with concern the continued financial difficulties of Aberdeen’s Glencraft and other Scottish workplaces specifically for blind and other disabled employees; calls on these five companies to consider amalgamation to form one viable, national company, as seen in a model English group called PLUSS; recognises the need for places of sheltered employment, and calls on the UK and Scottish governments and local authorities to work with the sheltered employment groups to find a viable solution.
S3M-1532 Glencraft Aberdeen (lodged on 10 March 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
